lst.name: sentence
lst.str: SELA presented the document to a week-long conference of latin american financial and economic experts, meeting to lay the groundwork for this year's annual meeting of the united nations conference on trade and development (unctad).

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: SELA called for new efforts to break "the vicious circle of debt, stagnation and productive retrogression the region has been immersed in since the beginning of the decade."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It notes that other favorable strategies include foreign investment/debt equity swaps, already successfully experimented with in some countries.
